thread.title: George Pell's lawyer says no evidence to back charges

title: George Pell's lawyer says no evidence to back charges
text:
George Pell's lawyer says no evidence to back charges Thursday, March 29, 2018 - 01:15 
Vatican Treasurer George Pell’s lawyer says there was no evidence to support charges of historical sexual offences against the Australian cardinal, after four weeks of questioning accusers and witnesses ended Thursday. Ed Giles reports.   
Vatican Treasurer George Pell’s lawyer says there was no evidence to support charges of historical sexual offences against the Australian cardinal, after four weeks of questioning accusers and witnesses ended Thursday. Ed Giles reports.  //reut.rs/2J2Z3Ta
